headline: Synopsys Accelerates AI and Multi-Die Design Innovation on Advanced Samsung Foundry Processes
summary: Synopsys, Inc. (Nasdaq: SNPS) announced today its ongoing close collaboration with Samsung Foundry to power the next generation of designs for advanced edge AI, HPC, and AI applications. The collaboration between the companies is helping mutual customers achieve successful tape-outs of their complex designs using Synopsys' 3DIC Compiler and Samsung's advanced packaging technologies with fast turnaround time. Mutual customers can improve power, performance and area (PPA) with certified EDA flows
